mapper.sql: inform_id, inform_name, create_date, creator_id, creator_name, update_date, enable
mapper.select:
select
,
from inform_notice where 1=1
and inform_name like '%${informName}%'
and enable = '1'
limit ${offset},${limit}
mapper.insert: insert into inform_notice (inform_id, inform_name, create_date, creator_id, creator_name, update_date, enable, inform_content) values (#{informId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{informName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{informContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update inform_notice
inform_name = #{informName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inform_content = #{informContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where inform_id = #{informId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
